note.p: Birth: Measham, near Ashby-de-la-Zouch, Leicestershire, England (08 January 1868)
Death: On board ship near Cape Town, South Africa (25 May 1939)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1939-1941 vol 3 pp 159-172, plate, by A S Eddington
References: S Chandrasekhar, 'Verifying the Theory of Relativity' in NR 1975-6 vol 30 pp 249-260
W H McCrea, 'The Royal Observatory and the Study of Gravitation' in NR 1975-6 vol 30 pp 133-140, plate
